page.title: 13What work do we do ?
page.content:
We looked at the jobs of sixy five people living in{Hampton-in-Arden.} Professional. 26 Farmer 2 Clerical 4 Buying/Selling 2 Manual 8 Unemployed 1 Health Service 5 Advisory 5 Engineer 5 Analysis 2 Design 2
From these results we concluded that {one third}of those approached had a {professional}job. More than half of this group were in managerial positions or directors of companies. There was a small group of people whom it was difficult to categorise. They all provided a necessary{public} {service.}They were:- a broadcaster, a Member of the European Parliament, a policeman, a playgroup supervisor and a golf instructor.
